author: Brenda Goh
title: Despair and pride in China's Wuhan as coronavirus lockdown eases
description: Residents of China's Wuhan city, ground zero for the coronavirus pandemic, have mixed emotions as containment measures are lifted and the community infection rate slows to a trickle, with some praising the government and others ruing the economic costs.
